title: ILayerMgr.IGetLayerList
description: Gets a list of layers in this drawing document.
returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of strings containing the name of each ILayer object in this ILayerMgr object VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
This is a 0-based array (first element is at position 0).
Call
ILayerMgr::GetCount
to determine the size of the array.
